rules.to: payload.(	    $texts := langs.ENGLISH;	    $types := customtypes;	{	    "online": online.{	        "dir": add,	        "tid": tid,	        "name": $lookup($texts, tid),	        "convert": of,	        "unit": $lookup($texts, m),	        "btype": ty,	        "tdesc": $lookup($types, ty)	        }^(dir),	    "holding": holding.{	        "dir": add,	        "tid": tid,	        "name": $lookup($texts, tid),	        "cat": cat,	        "max": max,	        "min": min,	        "start": start,	        "len": len,	        "btype": ty,	        "tdesc": $lookup($types, ty)	        }^(dir,start),	    "commands": commands,	    "data": data.{	        "dir": add,	        "tid": tid,	        "name": $lookup($texts, tid),	        "convert": of,	        "cat": cat,	        "type": ty,	        "tdesc": $lookup($types, ty)	        }^(dir),	    "properties": properties	}) ~> | *.tdesc.values | $merge($each($, function($v, $k) {{$k: $lookup($$.payload.langs.ENGLISH, $v)}})) |

name: scale and interpret
